topic.title: ADMITTED PATIENTS RISK ASSESSED FOR VENOUS THROMBOEMBOLISM IN MONTH TOTAL
topic.shortdesc: ADMITTED PATIENTS RISK ASSESSED FOR VENOUS THROMBOEMBOLISM IN MONTH TOTAL is the total number of PATIENTS (aged 16 and over) admitted to a Hospital Provider in the month, who are risk assessed using the Venous Thromboembolism Risk Assessment Tool.
